reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Trixie and Giorgios continue to run absolutely stunning rooms at very good prices. Superbly decorated.
reviews.title: Good as ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from our third visit there and we found the family room even better than the top floor balcony room we had slept in before. More spacious with a bigger balcony. Not much had changed other than there was a new telly in every room, not that we switched it on at any stage.
reviews.title: Stunning views wonderful hosts
